column1: * 1932 - C.S. Lewis recommends his brother Warren Lewis in a letter to read J.R.R. Tolkiens translation of The Owl and the Nightingale.
* 1956 - Voice actor Jim Piddock is born.
* 1958 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letters letter 206 and letter 207.
* 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Roger Verhulst (8 April 1966).
** Eorl and the Éothéod travel towards the Field of Celebrant.
